tooltip.chromaticarsenal.golden_heart.tw: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Taking damage from a mob inflicts Wither on both the wearer and the attacker for %1$s§5 second(s)
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.1: §6Fully absorbs the damage of one attack, and then shatters
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.2: §6The shield takes %1$s§6 second(s) to repair itself
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.3: §aThere is a %1$s§b%%§a chance for the shield to not break when sustaining damage
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.tw: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Blocked damage is returned to the attacker, however damage taken is multiplied by %1$s§5 while the shield is broken
stat.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield_highe: Hardest Hit Blocked by Glass Shield
death.attack.chromaticarsenal.glass_shra: %1$s was impaled by magic glass shards
%1$s was impaled by magic glass shards whilst fighting %2$s
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.ward_crystal.tw: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Removes the magic damage penalty, however taking non-magic damage inflicts Weakness II for %1$s§5 second(s)
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.2: §6Grants the Speed effect at level %1$s§6 when in a light level of %2$s§6 or less
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.3: §6Prevents activation of Sculk Sensors from walking or falling short distances
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.t: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Adds a %1$s§b%%§5 chance to dodge attacks in darkness, however being in light causes Blindness
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.duality_rings.1: §dIncreases the effectiveness of Magic Garlic Bread
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.duality_rings.t: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Magic Garlic Bread also grants Saturation for %1$s§5 second(s), however not having this effect inflicts Hunger at level %2$s
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.friendly_fire_f: §6Applies Fire Resistance for %1$s§6 seconds after being set on fire
§cChromatic Twisting:§5 Attacked mobs and attackers are set on fire, and %1$s§b%%§5 chance to not use durability, however causes constant fire damage
§aDamage dealt to other players or tamed mobs is also nullified
death.attack.chromaticarsenal.unfriendly: %1$s discovered their Friendly Fire Flower wasn't as friendly as they thought
%1$s was incinerated by their "Friendly" Fire Flower whilst fighting %2$s
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.lunar_crystal.2: §6Upon striking an enemy, has a 1 in %1$s§6 chance to inflict Levitation at level %2$s§6 for %3$s§6 seconds
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.lunar_crystal.t: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Increases the duration of inflicted Levitation, however the effect is also applied to the wearer and removes Levitation immunity
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.1: §2Prevents freeze damage and sinking in powder snow
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.2: §6Causes thrown snowballs to inflict %1$s§6 damage and the Chilled effect for %2$s§6 seconds
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.3: §6For targets weak to freezing, the effect is applied for %1$s§6 seconds
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.twist: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Allows melee attacks to inflict Chilled, however multiplies fire damage taken by %1$s§5 and inflicts speed and damage debuffs in hot places
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.1: §6Upon running out of air, restores the wearer's air supply
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.2: §6This ability further increases swimming speed for %1$s§6 seconds
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.3: §6Goes on cooldown for %1$s§6 seconds after this effect applies
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.t: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Grants indefinite Water Breathing, however movement speed on land is greatly reduced
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.c: Cooldown only ticks with a full air supply
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.gravity_stone.1: §6Prevents gravity from being reduced below the base value
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.gravity_stone.2: §6Prevents the floatiness from Slow Falling (the effect will still negate fall damage)
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.vertical_stasis: §6Negates the effects of gravity while sneaking
§6While in effect, sneaking won't prevent falling off ledges
§cChromatic Twisting: §5Applies Levitation instead of negating gravity
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.harpy_feather.2: §6While equipped, reduces fall damage taken by %1$s§b%%
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.harpy_feather.t: §cChromatic Twisting:§5 Use to quickly drop to the ground
§5This drop cancels horizontal momentum entirely and does NOT reset fall damage
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.chroma_salvager: §6When used, extracts chromatic energy from the item in the other hand
§6This energy is manifested into a new Chroma Shard or Essence of Ascension
§6The extracted item is destroyed, Super Curios are downgraded instead
§6The extracted item is destroyed in all cases
message.chromaticarsenal.salvage_blackli: A mysterious force prevents this curio from being salvaged.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_golden_he: §6This revival reduces max health by %1$s§b%%§6 for %2$s§6 seconds
§6After reviving, goes on cooldown for %1$s§6 seconds
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_glass_shi: §6Each revival adds %1$s§6 ticks to this item's cooldown
§6When this cooldown exceeds %1$s§6 ticks, this item will stop reviving
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_ward_crys: §6Reduces both positive and negative potion effect durations by %1$s§b%%
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_shadow_tr: §6Grants varying damage and speed bonuses depending on the time of day
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_lunar_cry: §2Grants immunity to fall damage and Levitation
§6Allows for bouncing out of the void, taking %1$s§6 damage in the process
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_harpy_fea: §6Upon use, performs a midair jump, followed by a gentle descent
§6While equipped, hold the jump button to ascend faster and further
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_glow_ring: §2Grants Night Vision, Glowing, and immunity to Blindness and Darkness
§6Attacking a mob inflicts Glowing for %1$s§6 seconds
§6Increases damage dealt to undead mobs by %1$s§b%%
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.ascended_star.1: §6Grants %1$s§6 extra fortune level(s) and %2$s§6 extra looting level(s)
death.attack.chromaticarsenal.ascended: %1$s ascended to a higher plane of reality
death.attack.chromaticarsenal.ascended.p: %1$s ascended to a higher plane of reality whilst fighting %2$s
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.world_anchor.1: §6The effects of this curio are more severe the further you are from the bottom of the world
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.world_anchor.2: §aThe curses on this curio are granting an additional %1$s§a fortune level(s)
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.world_anchor.2a: §6Can be cursed with Binding or Chromatic Twisting to grant additional fortune levels
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.world_anchor.tw: §cChromatic Twisting: §5Grants an additional level of fortune, however gravity effects are multiplied by %1$s
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.viewer_item.1: Even after several Minecraft version updates, it's still a Debug Item
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.viewer_item.2: This item's functionality may change in a later version, don't rely on it!
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.mark_twisted_de: §d§oCan you tolerate everything you know being deformed senselessly?
§5All equipped §6Chromatic Curios§5 will function as if they had the §6Curse of Chromatic Twisting§5.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.missing_bog: §cYou will not be able to obtain this item because Band of Gigantism is not installed.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.missing_bog2: §c(You can hide this message in the client config.)
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cooldown: Currently on cooldown for %1$s more ticks
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cursed: Once equipped, unequipping may prove to be fatal.
effect.chromaticarsenal.fractured.descri: Max health is reduced by 10% per level
message.chromaticarsenal.revival_cooldow: §6The Diamond Heart revival cooldown has finished.
effect.chromaticarsenal.spatial.descript: Reduces player gravity, grants immunity to Fall Damage
effect.chromaticarsenal.chilled.descript: Reduces movement speed by 30% and causes the target entity to freeze as if they were standing in Powder Snow
enchantment.chromaticarsenal.chromatic_t: Adds a negative effect to the curio, but in exchange grants another positive ability to the curio
modifier.chromaticarsenal.antigravity.de: Reduces the influence of gravity on you
modifier.chromaticarsenal.warded.descrip: Banishes the magic of an ability slot in exchange for a defense slot
modifier.chromaticarsenal.warded.error_l: Dispelled requires a different recipe for the first level
advancement.chromaticarsenal.chroma_shar: Obtain a Chroma Shard from a loot chest or Wandering Trader
advancement.chromaticarsenal.ascension_e: Obtain Essence of Ascension by combining a Nether Star with some Chroma Shards
advancement.chromaticarsenal.golden_hear: Loot a Golden Heart from a Bastion Remnant, or barter with Piglins to get one
advancement.chromaticarsenal.lunar_cryst: Find a Lunar Crystal in an End City chest
advancement.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.d: Loot a Cryo Ring from an Igloo Chest
advancement.chromaticarsenal.ascended_st: Assemble all of the Super Curios together to create the Ascended Star. Perhaps you shouldn't equip this...
advancement.chromaticarsenal.arsenal_acc: Acquire all of the chromatic curios!
advancement.chromaticarsenal.chroma_salv: Craft a Chroma Salvager, an item capable of salvaging excess chromatic curios back into Chroma Shards
advancement.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amul: Pick up a Bubble Amulet, which rarely drops from slain Drowned
